response.overview: An endearing modern-day story about how the lovable Goof bonds with his teenage son Max on a hilarious cross-country road trip. En route to the ol' fishing hole, they find themselves up to their floppy ears in misadventure!
response.tagline: It's hard to be cool when your Dad is Goofy.
response.title: A Goofy Movie

release_dates.note: AMC Pleasure Island, Walt Disney World Resort
